channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- POST SMTP
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- POST SMTP

item.title: CVE-2023-6621|2024-01-15T15:10:42.696Z -- unknown -- post%20smtp
item.description: The POST SMTP WordPress plugin before 2.8.7 does not sanitise and escape the msg parameter before outputting it back in the page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting which could be used against high privilege users such as admin.
